item.source: How do you display an interface?

item.title: How do you display an interface?
item.dc:creator: @slump40 slump40
item.description:
@slump40 wrote:

p.frames.showInterface(p, 408); p.frames.setString(p, "MESSAGE", 408, 0); p.frames.setString(p, "MESSAGE", 408, 1);

Thats what it would look like.

The p.frames.setstring is what the message will say and on what line.
408 is the frame and is need in each line of text code.

EDIT: add more strings and increase the last number by 1 and add another line of text.

Read full topic
